import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch'; import "./featured.css"; export default function Featured() { const apiUrl = process.env.API_URL const {data,loading,err} = useFetch(`${apiUrl}/hotels/countByCity?cities=berlin,madrid,london`) return (
{loading ? ( "Loading please wait" ) : ( <>

Berlin

{data[0]} properties

Madrid

{data[1]} properties

London

{data[2]} properties

)}
) }
